LanguageData.Torso.label: Torso
LanguageData.Torso.description: The human body apart from the head, neck, arms, and legs.
LanguageData.Waist.label: Waist
LanguageData.Waist.description: The typically narrowed part of the body between the hips and chest or upper back.
LanguageData.Stomach.label: Stomach
LanguageData.Stomach.description: The organ used for digesting food.
LanguageData.Neck.label: Neck
LanguageData.Neck.description: The bodypart that connects the head with the body.
LanguageData.Head.label: Head
LanguageData.Head.description: The base of operations for the human body that controls most of its movements.
LanguageData.Skull.label: Skull
LanguageData.Brain.label: Brain
LanguageData.Brain.description: The nervous center of the body that controls all of its actions and thoughts.
LanguageData.Eye.label: Eye
LanguageData.Eye.description: A specialized light-sensitive sensory structure of the body that is the image-forming organ of sight.
LanguageData.Ear.label: Ear
LanguageData.Ear.description: The sensory structure of the body used for hearing.
LanguageData.Nose.label: Nose
LanguageData.Nose.description: The part of the face that bears the nostrils and covers the anterior part of the nasal cavity.
LanguageData.Jaw.label: Jaw
LanguageData.Jaw.description: The parts constituting the walls of the mouth and serving to open and close it.
LanguageData.Shoulder.label: Shoulder
LanguageData.Shoulder.description: The part of the body that connects the torso with the arms.
LanguageData.Arm.label: Arm
LanguageData.Arm.description: The part of the body used for various precise actions.
LanguageData.Hand.label: Hand
LanguageData.Hand.description: The ending part of the arm.
LanguageData.Finger.label: Finger
LanguageData.Finger.description: Any of the five terminating members of the hand.
LanguageData.Leg.label: Leg
LanguageData.Leg.description: A limb used especially for supporting the body and for walking.
LanguageData.Foot.label: Foot
LanguageData.Foot.description: The ending part of the leg.
LanguageData.Toe.label: Toe
LanguageData.Toe.description: Any of the five terminating members of the foot.
LanguageData.Ribcage.label: Ribcage
LanguageData.Ribcage.description: A paired, curved bony rod that stiffens the walls of the body and protects the viscera.
LanguageData.Spine.label: Spine
LanguageData.Spine.description: The axial skeleton that consists of an articulated series of vertebrae which extend from the neck to the tail and protect the spinal cord.
LanguageData.Clavicle.label: Clavicle
LanguageData.Clavicle.description: A bone of the shoulder girdle typically serving to link the scapula and sternum.
LanguageData.Sternum.label: Sternum
LanguageData.Sternum.description: A compound ventral bone or cartilage of most vertebrates other than fishes that connects the ribs or the shoulder girdle or both and in humans consists of the manubrium, gladiolus, and xiphoid process.
LanguageData.Humerus.label: Humerus
LanguageData.Humerus.description: The long bone of the upper arm or forelimb extending from the shoulder to the elbow.
LanguageData.Radius.label: Radius
LanguageData.Radius.description: The bone on the thumb side of the human forearm.
LanguageData.Pelvis.label: Pelvis
LanguageData.Pelvis.description: A basin-shaped structure in the skeleton of many vertebrates that is formed by the pelvic girdle and adjoining bones of the spine.
LanguageData.Femur.label: Femur
LanguageData.Femur.description: The proximal bone of the hind or lower limb that extends from the hip to the knee.
LanguageData.Tibia.label: Tibia
LanguageData.Tibia.description: The inner and usually larger of the two bones of the vertebrate hind or lower limb between the knee and ankle.
